name: Gemini DevOps Copilot
description: An AI assistant that automates K8s configuration generation and incident response using the Gemini API. Reduces manual toil for DevOps teams by 80%.

name: Mentara AI
description: A mental wellness platform combining full-stack development with LLMs to provide supportive, empathetic conversations. Addresses the high cost of mental health access.

name: Code Vortex
description: A suite of developer tools designed to automate documentation and code review processes. Keeps documentation in sync with code changes via Git hooks.

name: Client-Side Netflix Clone
description: A pixel-perfect React UI clone of Netflix with a Firebase backend. Features a custom video player and dynamic content loading.

name: Object Tracking System
description: Real-time object detection and tracking system using YOLO and OpenCV.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Activity analytics dashboard for tracking fitness goals and progress.
